title: My account got hacked...... help me....
body: I got a link from a random guy on my friend list and he sent me a link, I went and signed in. After my account got hacked and I looked at my purchase history and saw my riven and project yasuo refunded....  I went to gifting history and i gifted the guy dragonslayer xin chao skin and icon with the RP that I refunded(IT IS NOT This happened when I got hacked).    Now, what should I do??   I lost my RP and gave it to a random guy.....   How can I get my skins and RP back? Please help me (T . T)

replies.body: Thank you so much. I will try it!

Damn, it really sucks to hear you might have fallen to a phishing attempt.  Don't worry, though, we can help!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account recovery team can help with possible reparations.  They can also help update your account info just to make sure everything is secure at this point.  You can add the name of the culprit in your ticket so we can investigate further.  Don't worry, you'll be in good hands!
